alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 8:08AM PDT until April 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM PDT MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL 11 PM PDT MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained northwest winds 15 to 25 mph, with gusts near 40 mph expected. * WHERE...The San Joaquin Valley and Coastal Range. * WHEN...Valid from 1 PM PDT Monday afternoon until 11 PM PDT Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles, such as campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Interstate 5, Highway 99, Highway 180, Highway 198, Highway 33, Highway 41, Highway 46, and Highway 152 through Pacheco Pass.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
